keys.LANG_PROCEDURES_DEFRETURN_TOOLTIP: A function with a return value.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_IF_IF_TOOLTIP: Add, remove, or reorder sections to reconfigure this 'if' block.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_IF_ELSEIF_TOOLTIP: Add a condition 'else if' to the 'if' block.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_IF_ELSE_TOOLTIP: Add a final, catch-all 'else' condition to the 'if' block.
keys.LANG_TEXT_CREATE_JOIN_TOOLTIP: Add, remove, or reorder sections to reconfigure this text block.
keys.LANG_TEXT_CREATE_JOIN_ITEM_TOOLTIP: Add an item to the text.
keys.LANG_BLUETOOTH_COMMAND_TOOLTIP: Receive a command through Bluetooth module
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_SETUP_LOOP_TOOLTIP: Blocks in setup will be executed at start, and blocks in Loop will be repeated continuously.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_WHILEUNTIL_TOOLTIP_WHILE: While the condition is true, then do the statements.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_WHILEUNTIL_TOOLTIP_UNTIL: While the condition is false, then do the statements.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_FOR_TOOLTIP: Counts from one to the given number. On each iteration, a variable 'iteration' increases its value.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_FLOW_STATEMENTS_TOOLTIP_BR: Breaks the execution of the current loop
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_IF_TOOLTIP_1: If the condition is true, execute the statements.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_BASE_DELAY_TOOLTIP: Waits the specified time in milliseconds (ms)
keys.LANG_LOGIC_STATE_TOOLTIP_2: Returns on or off depending on what is selected
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_EQ: Checks if both inputs are equal.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_NEQ: Checks if both inputs are different.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LT: Checks if the first input is smaller than the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LTE: Checks if the first input is smaller than or equal to the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GT: Checks if the first input is greater than the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GTE: Checks if the first input is greater than or equal to the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_OPERATION_TOOLTIP_AND: Checks if both inputs are true.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_OPERATION_TOOLTIP_OR: Checks if either inputs are true.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_NEGATE_TOOLTIP: Returns the opposite of the input.
keys.LANG_MATH_NUMBER_TOOLTIP: A number. Use decimal point '.' to create a decimal number.
keys.LANG_MATH_BASE_MAP_TOOLTIP: Re-scales the input from [0-1023] to another range.
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_MATH_SINUSOID_TOOLTIP: Returns a decimal number that varies between -1 and 1 over the time at indicated frequency (number of repetitions on every second)
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_MATH_RANDOM_TOOLTIP: Returns a random number between the two limits.
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_GET_TOOLTIP: Returns the value of a variable.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_FOR_LOOP_WARNING5: Must be used in a 'for' loop instruction
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_SET_TOOLTIP: Sets the value of a variable.
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_PLUS_ONE_TOOLTIP: Add one to the variable (use only with numbers)
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_MINUS_ONE_TOOLTIP: Substracts one to the variable (use only with numbers)
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_GLOBAL_TOOLTIP: Creates a variable. The variable can be a number, text or binary depending on its assignment.
keys.LANG_TEXT_TEXT_TOOLTIP: A letter, word, or line of text.
keys.LANG_TEXT_LENGTH_TOOLTIP: Returns number of letters (including spaces) in the provided text.
keys.LANG_TEXT_EQUALSIGNORECASE_TOOLTIP: Checks if both text inputs are equal, regardless of the case.
keys.LANG_TEXT_LENGTH_LOWER_TOOLTIP: Returns a text in lower case.
keys.LANG_TEXT_LENGTH_UPPER_TOOLTIP: Returns a text in upper case.
keys.LANG_TEXT_NUMBER_CAST_TOOLTIP: Converts the text into a number
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_ANALOG_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the value from an analog pin
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_DIGITAL_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the value from a digital pin
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_ANALOG_WRITE_TOOLTIP: Write a value between 0 and 255 to an analog output pin.
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_DIGITAL_WRITE_TOOLTI: Write a value in a digital pin
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_BUILTIN_LED_TOOLTIP: Built-in LED that is internally connected to pin 13
keys.LANG_BQ_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Reads the value of a button input.
keys.LANG_BQ_BUTTON_LONG_SHORT_TOOLTIP: Discriminates how long the button is pressed (long click or just a click)
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_AVAILABLE_TOOLTIP: Check whether the USB serial port is available or not
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_PARSE_NUMBER_TOOLTI: Returns a number received from the USB serial port
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_READSTRING_TOOLTIP: Reads text received from USB serial port as text.
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_PLOT_TOOLTIP: Sends data to be shown in the plotter
keys.LANG_US_TOOLTIP: Returns the distance measured by the ultrasonic sensor.
keys.LANG_US_COLLISION_TOOLTIP: Detects collision or free cases based on a distance threshold with the ultrasonic sensor
keys.LANG_LED_MATRIX_GENERIC_TOOLTIP: Builds a generic expression for LED Matrix
keys.LANG_LED_MATRIX_DRAWING_ICONS_TOOLTIP: Image to show on the LEDs matrix
keys.LANG_INFRARED_ANALOG_TOOLTIP: Returns the analog value measured by the infrared sensor.
keys.LANG_INFRARED_DIGITAL_TOOLTIP: Returns the digital value measured by the infrared sensor.
keys.LANG_RGB_LED_TOOLTIP: Set a colour on a RGB LED
keys.LANG_SIMPLEEXPRESSIONS_LED_STRIP_TOOLTIP: Sets data for a LED strip pixel
keys.LANG_PIEZO_BUZZER_PREDEF_SOUNDS_TOOLTIP: Plays some basic sounds with a buzzer.
keys.LANG_PIEZO_BUZZER_MELODY_TOOLTIP: Plays a melody with a buzzer.
keys.LANG_MUSIC_NOTE_TOOLTIP: Music note. Combine it to create a melody.
keys.LANG_ZUM_PIEZO_BUZZERAV_TOOLTIP: Makes the buzzer vibrate at the indicated frequency and duration
keys.LANG_TEMP_REQUEST_AND_READ_TEMP_TOOLTIP: Reads temperature from 18B20 sensor in Celsius degrees.
keys.LANG_HUMID_READ_HUMID_DHT_TOOLTIP: Reads humidity from DHT11 sensor in %.
keys.LANG_TEMP_READ_TEMP_DHT_TOOLTIP: Reads temperature from DHT11 sensor in Celcius degrees.
keys.LANG_RAINDROP_ANALOG_TOOLTIP: Reads the quatity of rain (with the analog signal returns a value between 0 and 1023).
keys.LANG_RAINDROP_DIGITAL_TOOPTIP: Detects water precense or rain (adjust level with the potentiometer).
keys.LANG_GAS_ANALOG_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the analog output of a gas sensor.
keys.LANG_GAS_DIGITAL_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the digital output of a gas sensor (adjust level with the potentiometer).
keys.LANG_PRESSURE_READ_PRESSURE_BMP_TOOLTIP: Reads barometric pressure with a BMP180 sensor in Pa.
keys.LANG_TEMP_READ_TEMP_BMP_TOOLTIP: Reads temperature with BMP180 sensor in Celsius degrees.
keys.LANG_ALTITUDE_READ_ALTITUDE_BMP_TOOLTIP: Estimates altitude. Estimated sea-level preassure is 101325 Pa.
keys.LANG_HUMID_READ_HUMID_SOIL_TOOLTIP: Reads humidity from an analog soil sensor (0-1023).
keys.LANG_LIGHT_SENSOR_TOOLTIP: Reads light from an analog light-depender resistor (0-1023).
keys.LANG_OLED_DISPLAY_TOOLTIP: Write a string of characters on an OLED screen of 0.96' 128x64
keys.LANG_OLED_CLEAR_TOOLTIP: Deletes the contents of the OLED screen
